PHRASE.LANG: "C'mon. Let's do something insane like save the world." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Allez, faisons quelque chose de dément comme sauver le monde." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Los geht's! Lass uns was Verrücktes tun, die Welt retten zum Beispiel." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Dai, facciamo qualcosa di assurdo, per esempio salvare il mondo." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
"Venga, vamos a hacer alguna locura, como salvar el mundo." [TM & © 2012 Marvel & Subs.] [#Legal]
